mapper.select: SELECT oi.ORDER_ITEM_ID AS orderItemId, oi.PRODUCT_ID AS productId, p.THUMBNAIL_URL AS thumbnailUrl, oi.CANCELED_COUNT AS canceledCount, oi.USED_COUNT AS usedCount, (oi.ITEM_COUNT - oi.CANCELED_COUNT - oi.USED_COUNT) AS remainingCount, oi.ITEM_PRICE AS price, NVL(p.DISCOUNT_RATE, 0) AS discountRate, TRUNC(p.price * (1 - NVL(p.discount_rate, 0)/100), -2) AS discountedPrice, TO_CHAR(o.CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS purchaseDate, p.PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, p.BRAND_NAME AS brandName FROM ORDER_ITEM oi JOIN ORDERS o ON oi.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID JOIN PRODUCT p ON oi.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE o.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId, javaType=long, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND p.BH_TYPE = #{bhType, javaType=int, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND o.ORDER_STATUS = 11 -- 구매확정만 AND (oi.ITEM_COUNT - oi.CANCELED_COUNT - oi.USED_COUNT) > 0 -- 남은 등록 가능 수량 ORDER BY oi.ORDER_ITEM_ID DESC
